title: Language Education Performance Prediction and Support Strategies Using Online Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with online learning platforms and practical experience in language education
context.additional_context: Course for current elementary school teachers to learn how to predict learner performance and establish support strategies using learning analytics tools in non-real-time LMS environments

learning_goals: Collect and analyze learner activity data within LMS using learning analytics tools
Design personalized learning support strategies based on the correlation between study time and academic performance
Interpret data patterns from synchronous and asynchronous learning environments to suggest educational improvement plans
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
